mapper.select: select serialno "serialno", customerno "customerno", version "version", username "username", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", moneyscale "moneyscale", mobile "mobile", dutyway "dutyway", moneytype "moneytype", amount "amount", paydatelimit "paydatelimit", address "address", position "position", sortnum "sortnum", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.member_submit where serialno = #{serialno} for update

select serialno "serialno", customerno "customerno", version "version", username "username", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", moneyscale "moneyscale", mobile "mobile", dutyway "dutyway", moneytype "moneytype", amount "amount", paydatelimit "paydatelimit", address "address", position "position", sortnum "sortnum", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.member_submit where serialno = #{serialno}

select serialno "serialno", customerno "customerno", version "version", username "username", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", moneyscale "moneyscale", mobile "mobile", dutyway "dutyway", moneytype "moneytype", amount "amount", paydatelimit "paydatelimit", address "address", position "position", sortnum "sortnum", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.member_submit where serialno = #{serialno}
mapper.insert: insert into cas.member_submit( serialno,customerno,version,username,certificatetype, certificateno,moneyscale,mobile,dutyway,moneytype, amount,paydatelimit,address,position,sortnum, insertdate,inserttime,updatedate,updatetime ) values( #{serialno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{version, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{moneyscale, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dutyway, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{moneytype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{paydatelimit, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sortnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into cas.member_submit( serialno,customerno,version,username,certificatetype, certificateno,moneyscale,mobile,dutyway,moneytype, amount,paydatelimit,address,position,sortnum, insertdate,inserttime,updatedate,updatetime ) values
( #{item.serialno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.version, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.username, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.moneyscale, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.dutyway, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.moneytype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.amount, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.paydatelimit, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.position, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.sortnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
